The file content with the documentation metadata removed is:

<ProgramListing>

<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===- MergeICmps.cpp - Optimize chains of integer comparisons ------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass turns chains of integer comparisons into memcmp (the memcmp is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// later typically inlined as a chain of efficient hardware comparisons). This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// typically benefits c++ member or nonmember operator==().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The basic idea is to replace a longer chain of integer comparisons loaded</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from contiguous memory locations into a shorter chain of larger integer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// comparisons. Benefits are double:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - There are less jumps, and therefore less opportunities for mispredictions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    and I-cache misses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - Code size is smaller, both because jumps are removed and because the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    encoding of a 2&#42;n byte compare is smaller than that of two n-byte</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    compares.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  struct S &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    int a;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    char b;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    char c;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    uint16&#95;t d;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    bool operator==(const S&amp; o) const &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      return a == o.a &amp;&amp; b == o.b &amp;&amp; c == o.c &amp;&amp; d == o.d;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Is optimized as :</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    bool S::operator==(const S&amp; o) const &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      return memcmp(this, &amp;o, 8) == 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Which will later be expanded (ExpandMemCmp) as a single 8-bytes icmp.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/mergeicmps-h">llvm/Transforms/Scalar/MergeICmps.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/scalar-h">llvm/Transforms/Scalar.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/basicblockutils-h">llvm/Transforms/Utils/BasicBlockUtils.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/buildlibcalls-h">llvm/Transforms/Utils/BuildLibCalls.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We want to order BCEAtoms by (Base, Offset). However we cannot use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the pointer values for Base because these are non-deterministic.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// To make sure that the sort order is stable, we first assign to each atom</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// base value an index based on its order of appearance in the chain of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// comparisons. We call this index &#96;BaseOrdering&#96;. For example, for:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    b&#91;3&#93; == c&#91;2&#93; &amp;&amp; a&#91;1&#93; == d&#91;1&#93; &amp;&amp; b&#91;4&#93; == c&#91;3&#93;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    |  block 1 |    |  block 2 |    |  block 3 |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// b gets assigned index 0 and a index 1, because b appears as LHS in block 1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which is before block 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We then sort by (BaseOrdering&#91;LHS.Base()&#93;, LHS.Offset), which is stable.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-mergeicmps-cpp-/bceatom/#a7c942223dede5ae8037819e1b8bd9197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-mergeicmps-cpp-/bceatom/#a7c942223dede5ae8037819e1b8bd9197">operator&lt;</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-mergeicmps-cpp-/bceatom/#ac3b81d87ed2aa182494826c96fc973b1">BCEAtom</a> &amp;O)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-mergeicmps-cpp-/bceatom/#a295394fb1dc702075e4d88f6064f5a0c">BaseId</a> != O.BaseId ? <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-mergeicmps-cpp-/bceatom/#a295394fb1dc702075e4d88f6064f5a0c">BaseId</a> &lt; O.BaseId : <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-mergeicmps-cpp-/bceatom/#ab1515a9e9af1340a212e5c498bf1f146">Offset</a>.slt(O.Offset);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a> = LoadI-&gt;getDataLayout();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#abf1028e2af158aae1e00d3288ca013bb">isDereferenceablePointer</a>(Addr, LoadI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;not dereferenceable\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We need to make sure that we can do comparison in any order, so we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// require memory to be unconditionally dereferenceable.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A comparison between two BCE atoms, e.g. &#96;a == o.a&#96; in the example at the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// top.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note: the terminology is misleading: the comparison is symmetric, so there</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is no real &#123;l/r&#125;hs. What we want though is to have the same base on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// left (resp. right), so that we can detect consecutive loads. To ensure this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we put the smallest atom on the left.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-mergeicmps-cpp-/bcecmp"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-mergeicmps-cpp-/bcecmp/#a50c3e5d7755731a03d6b82b78c8972a0">BCECmp</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-mergeicmps-cpp-/bcecmp/#a61e64ba3d488e0bf680eabadd977f190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-mergeicmps-cpp-/bceatom">BCEAtom</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-mergeicmps-cpp-/bcecmp/#a61e64ba3d488e0bf680eabadd977f190">Lhs</a>;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A basic block with a comparison between two BCE atoms.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The block might do extra work besides the atom comparison, in which case</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// doesOtherWork() returns true. Under some conditions, the block can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// split into the atom comparison part and the &quot;other work&quot; part</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (see canSplit()).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-mergeicmps-cpp-/bcecmpblock"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-mergeicmps-cpp-/bcecmpblock/#a4283e87062ea62462528f1dfaf8ca8e8">BCECmpBlock</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns true if the non-BCE-cmp instructions can be separated from BCE-cmp</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions in the block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> canSplit(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae457f1cf451ed893666c4a384e58f8e5">AliasAnalysis</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a>) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return true if this all the relevant instructions in the BCE-cmp-block can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// be sunk below this instruction. By doing this, we know we can separate the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// BCE-cmp-block instructions from the non-BCE-cmp-block instructions in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// block.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Visit the given comparison. If this is a comparison between two valid</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-mergeicmps-cpp-/baseidentifier">BaseIdentifier</a> &amp;BaseId) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The comparison can only be used once:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - For intermediate blocks, as a branch condition.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - For the final block, as an incoming value for the Phi.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there are any other uses of the comparison, we cannot merge it with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// other comparisons as we would create an orphan use of the value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CmpI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a3a402430a1bbe70a9282dcb0e0b6a2cd">hasOneUse</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Phi.getIncomingValueForBlock(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e00fad9c34de40b1e31f3aa6f8e024cae1e4c8c9ccd9fc39c391da4bcd093fb2">Block</a>, Phi.getParent(), BaseId);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Comparison) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;chain with invalid BCECmpBlock, no merge.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Comparison-&gt;doesOtherWork()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;block &#39;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Comparison-&gt;BB-&gt;getName()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#39; does extra work besides compare\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Comparisons.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is the initial block in the chain, in case this block does other</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// work, we can try to split the block and move the irrelevant</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions to the predecessor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is not the initial block in the chain, splitting it wont</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// work.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// As once split, there will still be instructions before the BCE cmp</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions that do other work in program order, i.e. within the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// chain before sorting. Unless we can abort the chain at this point</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and start anew.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NOTE: we only handle blocks a with single predecessor for now.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Comparison-&gt;canSplit(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Split initial block &#39;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Comparison-&gt;BB-&gt;getName()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#39; that does extra work besides compare\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Comparison-&gt;RequireSplit = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-mergeicmps-cpp-/#a31aca09aa25a26dccff0bdaebcbfbcb7">enqueueBlock</a>(Comparisons, std::move(&#42;Comparison));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;ignoring initial block &#39;&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; Comparison-&gt;BB-&gt;getName()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;&#39; that does extra work besides compare\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO(courbet): Right now we abort the whole chain. We could be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// merging only the blocks that don&#39;t do other work and resume the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// chain from there. For example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  if (a&#91;0&#93; == b&#91;0&#93;) &#123;  // bb1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    if (a&#91;1&#93; == b&#91;1&#93;) &#123;  // bb2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      some&#95;value = 3; //bb3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      if (a&#91;2&#93; == b&#91;2&#93;) &#123; //bb3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        do a ton of stuff  //bb4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// bb1 --eq--&gt; bb2 --eq--&gt; bb3&#42; -eq--&gt; bb4 --+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  \\            \\           \\               \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      //   ne           ne          ne              \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">      //    \\            \\           \\               v</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     +------------+-----------+----------&gt; bb&#95;phi</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can only merge the first two comparisons, because bb3&#42; does</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;other work&quot; (setting some&#95;value to 3).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We could still merge bb1 and bb2 though.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">size</a> == 0)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Slow path: at least two blocks, at least one block with a name.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Scratch.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We&#39;ll have &#96;size&#96; bytes for name and &#96;Comparisons.size() - 1&#96; bytes for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// separators.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Scratch.reserve(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">size</a> + Comparisons.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>() - 1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> append = &#91;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> str) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Scratch.append(str.begin(), str.end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 1, E = Comparisons.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; E; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PhiBB = Phi.getParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add a branch to the next basic block in the chain.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Continue to phi, passing it the comparison result.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Continue to next block if equal, exit to phi else.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;skip: block &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; BlockIndex</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot; does not link back to the phi\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlight">    CurBlock = SinglePredecessor;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Blocks&#91;0&#93; = CurBlock;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Blocks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-mergeicmps-cpp-/#ac6d407975ce40c65a627e26212bf60fd"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-mergeicmps-cpp-/#ac6d407975ce40c65a627e26212bf60fd">processPhi</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/phinode">PHINode</a> &amp;Phi, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetlibraryinfo">TargetLibraryInfo</a> &amp;TLI, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae457f1cf451ed893666c4a384e58f8e5">AliasAnalysis</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><span class="doxyHighlight">                <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreeupdater">DomTreeUpdater</a> &amp;DTU) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;processPhi()\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Phi.getNumIncomingValues() &lt;= 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;skip: only one incoming value in phi\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We are looking for something that has the following structure:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   bb1 --eq--&gt; bb2 --eq--&gt; bb3 --eq--&gt; bb4 --+</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     \\            \\           \\               \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  //      ne           ne          ne              \\</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  //       \\            \\           \\               v</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//        +------------+-----------+----------&gt; bb&#95;phi</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - The last basic block (bb4 here) must branch unconditionally to bb&#95;phi.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    It&#39;s the only block that contributes a non-constant value to the Phi.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - All other blocks (b1, b2, b3) must have exactly two successors, one of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    them being the phi block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - All intermediate blocks (bb2, bb3) must have only one predecessor.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  - Blocks cannot do other work besides the comparison, see doesOtherWork()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The blocks are not necessarily ordered in the phi, so we start from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// last block and reconstruct the order.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;LastBlock = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; Phi.getNumIncomingValues(); ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;ConstantInt&gt;</a>(Phi.getIncomingValue(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LastBlock) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are several non-constant values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;skip: several non-constant values\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;ICmpInst&gt;</a>(Phi.getIncomingValue(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;ICmpInst&gt;</a>(Phi.getIncomingValue(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>))-&gt;getParent() !=</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><span class="doxyHighlight">            Phi.getIncomingBlock(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Non-constant incoming value is not from a cmp instruction or not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// produced by the last block. We could end up processing the value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// producing block more than once.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is an uncommon case, so we bail.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;skip: non-constant value not from cmp or not from last block.\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><span class="doxyHighlight">    LastBlock = Phi.getIncomingBlock(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!LastBlock) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There is no non-constant block.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;skip: no non-constant block\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (LastBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a79c007dcf9fff57e1569e778d7885b5e">getSingleSuccessor</a>() != Phi.getParent()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;skip: last block non-phi successor\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Blocks =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-mergeicmps-cpp-/#a5b2e625679f6ef442bd50c46920e6048">getOrderedBlocks</a>(Phi, LastBlock, Phi.getNumIncomingValues());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Blocks.empty()) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We only try merging comparisons if the target wants to expand memcmp later.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The rationale is to avoid turning small chains into memcmp calls.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.enableMemCmpExpansion(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.hasOptSize(), </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we don&#39;t have memcmp avaiable we can&#39;t emit calls to it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!TLI.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetlibraryinfo/#a54699e3f128acda6003afc11d3027f6c">has</a>(LibFunc&#95;memcmp))</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreeupdater">DomTreeUpdater</a> DTU(DT, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;PostDominatorTree&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     DomTreeUpdater::UpdateStrategy::Eager);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MadeChange = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"></CodeLine>
